title: Research: Ntfy on Story Completion
description: Research how to send rich ntfy notifications when each story completes - for both Ralph AND direct Claude sessions. Format: Title=[Ralph/Claude] {repo} {icon} | {story-id}, Body=story title, model, cost, what was done, what's next.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Review current ntfy.ts implementation and RichNtfyOptions
Review runner/index.ts - where story completion is detected
Review runner/types.ts - what data is available (cost, tokens, model)
Research how repoClaude (golemClaude etc) can send ntfy on task completion
Design body: line1=story title + model, line2=cost/tokens, line3=next story preview
Document icon mapping: checkmark=done, arrows=progress, warning=blocked, x=error
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
